body.name: Boiron StressCalm for Relief of Stress, Anxiousness, Nervousness, Irritability, and Fatigue - 60 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 43 mins
features: PLANT-POWERED, MULTI-SYMPTOM STRESS RELIEF: StressCalm is powered by plants to relieve occasional symptoms of everyday stress, including nervous tension, irritability, hypersensitivity, and fatigue.* It’s sedative-free, so you can stay focused and relaxed without feeling drowsy.

MELTAWAY TABLETS - NO WATER NEEDED: These easy-to-take unflavored meltaway tablets dissolve in your mouth without the need for water. They can be taken on an empty stomach, making them ideal for home, work, or on the go. Recommended for adults and children ages 12 and older.
NON-DROWSY FORMULA: Stay calm with StressCalm's sedative-free formula. Enjoy the benefits of relief without the worry of drowsiness.

HELP YOUR BODY THE NATURAL WAY: StressCalm is a homeopathic stress relief medicine that has no known interactions with other medications, herbs, or supplements. It’s also gluten-free with no artificial sweeteners, flavors, colors, or preservatives.
A TRUSTED BRAND: With more than 90 years of expertise, Boiron medicines are manufactured to meet the highest standards of cGMP and HPUS for purity and quality.
body.description: Boiron StressCalm provides an over-the-counter option to relieve symptoms of occasional stress such as nervousness, irritability, hypersensitivity, and fatigue. Its blend of plant-based active ingredients reduce nervous tension, calming both mind and body. As a non-sedative, non-drowsy homeopathic medicine, it helps you stay focused and relaxed without affecting alertness, so it can be taken before performing, public speaking, taking a test, or flying. It can also be used up to two weeks for occasional stress from starting a new job, moving into a new house, or planning a wedding. StressCalm is non-habit forming and won’t cause drowsiness. Convenient and discreet, the meltaway tablets are easy to take without water at the onset of symptoms and can be taken on an empty stomach. This medicine has no known interactions with other medications or supplements and is made without any artificial sweeteners, colors, flavors, or preservatives. Recommended for everyone ages 12 and older, StressCalm is available over the counter in a box of of unflavored tablets sealed in blister packs for easy use at work, home, or while traveling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find Your Calm with Plant-Powered StressCalm. When life sometimes stresses you out, let non-drowsy StressCalm in. Its blend of plant-based active ingredients reduces symptoms of occasional stress like nervous tension, irritability and fatigue.* StressCalm is non-habit forming and won’t affect alertness, so you can stay focused and relaxed.

Plant-Powered Relief Formulated with plant-based active ingredients, no artificial sweeteners, colors, flavors, or preservatives & gluten-free. Meltaway Tablets Melt in your mouth without food, water, chewing, or swallowing. Sedative-Free & Non-Drowsy Does not affect alertness or cause drowsiness & does not contain sedatives. Non-Habit Forming & No Known Drug Interactions Does not induce dependency & has no known interactions with other medications or supplements.

*Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works extremely well!
reviews.reviewText: I was most pleased with this product. It does what it says and definitely relieves stress in about 15 minutes.It says to take 2 tiny tablets which you let melt under your tongue. I decided to just try one and see how strong they might be. One definitely was strong enough for me...perhaps a bit too strong, so the next day i tried just 1/2 tablet and that was perfect. Takes the edge of the anxiety completely and totally relaxes me.I will be buying these again and no longer will have to buy a different expensive brand of anxiety pills.Highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It makes me feel normal again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get anxiety when flying and these melted away any stress or unease I had. That said, like any ‘medication’, you build a tolerance if you keep taking them in a short period of time and they begin to work less and less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can only say that this really calms me on those days when I want to pull my hair out. I also use it when I want a guaranteed good night's sleep. They melt in the mouth with little to no flavor at all. I will buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s been a few days and I feel like it’s helping slightly,, will continue using

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Trying more natural ways to help. These work great. I was impressed they actually work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great product from Boiron
reviews.reviewText: I will be re-ordering, these are great for those stressful hard to relax evenings and these did not leave you any morning residual fogginess. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really helped me
reviews.reviewText: Im shocked because I've been on a keto diet for almost a month now and I have been so irritable which I never am. I thought I would give them a try and it made me totally calm and relaxed. These really helped me.
